name: Jet Mouse | Ride with Mr Mouse
name_original: Jet Mouse | Ride with Mr Mouse
description:
Be Mr Mouse, and game on to collect coins! A game for Casual Gamers. Visit us at www.rishavapps.com or on Instagram @rishavapps. Rate us below and let us know of any flaws in the Game. Post your scores tagging #JetMouse & get a chance to be featured on our Instagram*!

Tap to get Mr Mouse past each obstacle and collect coins.

Download Now!
